name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear
description: Back in full force is Tom Clancy's hallmark realism and suspense in Rogue Spear™, the sequel to PC Gamer's 1998 Action Game of the Year - Rainbow Six™.Rogue Spear straddles the razor's edge separating justice from the dark forces of geopolitical turmoil. It blends spine-tingling tactics and explosive action into intense counter-terrorist warfare.Lead the RAINBOW team of elite multi-national special operatives against two deadly terrorist organizations. Life or death missions will take you to real world settings across the globe, including a Jumbo Jet airplane and the Museum of Art. Rogue Spear seems so real, you'll be yelling 'Tango Down' in your sleep for weeks.
